name: Kling 2.5 Turbo Image to Video Generator
description:
Generates videos from a single input image and a text prompt using the Kling 2.5 Turbo image-to-video model via the kie.ai API.
Supports customization with prompt, duration, negative prompt, CFG scale, and filename for local save.
Pricing (as of November 2025): $0.21 per 5s video,  and $0.42 per 10s video.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if video generation is complete). Default: 5

input_image_path.description: Required full local path to the input reference image; supported: jpg, jpeg, png, webp; max size 10MB

cfg_scale.description: Optional Classifier Free Guidance (CFG) scale from 0 to 1, step 0.1. The Classifier Free Guidance scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt. Uses the model default if not provided.

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created video (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

duration.description: Optional duration of the video, in seconds, one of '5' or '10', default '5'

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative text prompt to describe what to avoid in the video. Max 2496 characters

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video motion. Max length : 2500 characters.

local_path.description: Local path to the downloaded first video file
